Ask for pictures from previous and recent work the company has performed, or check out there website for a gallery.

Ask for a list of names and phone numbers of recent customers you can browse through and call at any point.

If you can not find on your own, ask them to provide you with a URL for there website, or facebook page. If the company can not provide you with either, this should be a red flag.
5. Full Address & Name of the Company
